resources.string: I\'m fetching data from Plurk, please wait a moment...
Are you sure to delete?
Are you really want to delete this post? I can\'t be undone.
Deleting...
I have deleted this post for you.
I\'m sorry, I can\'t delete this response...
System says it\'s caused by "%s".
Would you mind check internet connectivity and try it again later?
Blocking and deleting...
I have deleted this post and blocked this user for you.
I\'m sorry, I can\'t block this user...
System says it\'s caused by "%s".
Would you mind check internet connectivity and try it again later?
I\'m so sorry, I can\'t delete this plurk.
System says it\'s caused by "%s".
Would you mind check internet connectivity and try it again later?
Hmmm.... This thread seems not very active.
Do you want to participate this discussion so it will be more active?
I have fetched all response of this thread. Are you interested in this discussion?
If you want to share with others, please tell me so I could sent it Plurk for you.
Wow! This plurk is so active.
There are %d responses, the origin poster must be very happy.
There seems a problem, I can\'t read response from Plurk.
System says this error is caused by: "%s"

The thread is much more interseting after master\'s participation.
